title: banana smashed overnight oats
ingredients: 1 banana; smashed into a mason jar
instructions: Add the banana to a mason jar and smash it with a fork.
Add the salt, oats, chia seeds, cocoa powder, and cinnamon.
Fill with almond milk until the oats are fully covered.
Screw on the lid and shake until well mixed.
Enjoy cold in the morning. Will last a couple days in the fridge.
notes: No sugar needed. You can adjust the oats based on how thick you like it. Use 1/2 cup for a softer texture, up to 1 cup for a thicker, more filling result.
